00048 //IMPORTANT:
00049 //This function adds a NEWLY allocated schedule to the list.  The pointer passed is totally
00050 //separate.  So make sure that you delete the pointer if you don't need it anymore.  The editor
00051 //uses a single static node to copy data from, hence this method.
00052 void CopyScheduleToList( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule, SOLDIERINITNODE *pNode )
00053 {
00054       SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00055       curr = gpScheduleList;
00056       gpScheduleList = (SCHEDULENODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00057       memcpy( gpScheduleList, pSchedule, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00058       gpScheduleList->next = curr;
00059       gubScheduleID++;
00060       //Assign all of the links
00061       gpScheduleList->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00062       gpScheduleList->ubSoldierID = pNode->pSoldier->ubID;
00063       pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00064       pNode->pSoldier->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00065       if( gubScheduleID > 40 )
00066       { //Too much fragmentation, clean it up...
00067             OptimizeSchedules();
00068             if( gubScheduleID > 32 )
00069             {
00070                   AssertMsg( 0, "TOO MANY SCHEDULES POSTED!!!" );
00071             }
00072       }
00073 }
00074 
00075 SCHEDULENODE* GetSchedule( UINT8 ubScheduleID )
00076 {
00077       SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00078       curr = gpScheduleList;
00079       while( curr )
00080       {
00081             if( curr->ubScheduleID == ubScheduleID )
00082                   return curr;
00083             curr = curr->next;
00084       }
00085       return NULL;
00086 }
00087 
00088 //Removes all schedules from the event list, and cleans out the list.
00089 void DestroyAllSchedules()
00090 {
00091       SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00092       //First remove all of the events.
00093       DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE );
00094       //Now, delete all of the schedules.
00095       while( gpScheduleList )
00096       {
00097             curr = gpScheduleList;
00098             gpScheduleList = gpScheduleList->next;
00099             MemFree( curr );
00100       }
00101       gpScheduleList = NULL;
00102       gubScheduleID = 0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 // cleans out the schedule list without touching events, for saving & loading games
00106 void DestroyAllSchedulesWithoutDestroyingEvents()
00107 {
00108       SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00109 
00110       //delete all of the schedules.
00111       while( gpScheduleList )
00112       {
00113             curr = gpScheduleList;
00114             gpScheduleList = gpScheduleList->next;
00115             MemFree( curr );
00116       }
00117       gpScheduleList = NULL;
00118       gubScheduleID = 0;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void DeleteSchedule( UINT8 ubScheduleID )
00122 {
00123       SCHEDULENODE *curr, *temp = NULL;
00124 
00125       if (!gpScheduleList)
00126       {
00127             //ScreenMsg( 0, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Attempting to delete schedule that doesn't exist -- KM : 2" );
00128             return;
00129       }
00130 
00131       curr = gpScheduleList;
00132 
00133       if( gpScheduleList->ubScheduleID == ubScheduleID )
00134       { //Deleting the head
00135             temp = gpScheduleList;
00136             gpScheduleList = gpScheduleList->next;
00137       }
00138       else while( curr->next )
00139       {
00140             if( curr->next->ubScheduleID == ubScheduleID )
00141             {
00142                   temp = curr->next;
00143                   curr->next = temp->next;
00144                   break;
00145             }
00146             curr = curr->next;
00147       }
00148       if( temp )
00149       {
00150             DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE, temp->ubScheduleID );
00151             MemFree( temp );
00152       }
00153 }
00154 
00155 void ProcessTacticalSchedule( UINT8 ubScheduleID )
00156 {
00157       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule;
00158       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00159       INT32 iScheduleIndex=0;
00160       BOOLEAN fAutoProcess;
00161 
00162       //Attempt to locate the schedule.
00163       pSchedule = GetSchedule( ubScheduleID );
00164       if( !pSchedule )
00165       {
00166             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00167                   ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Schedule callback:  Schedule ID of %d not found.", ubScheduleID ); 
00168             #endif
00169             return;
00170       }
00171       //Attempt to access the soldier involved
00172       if( pSchedule->ubSoldierID >= TOTAL_SOLDIERS )
00173       {
00174             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00175                   ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Schedule callback:  Illegal soldier ID of %d.", pSchedule->ubSoldierID ); 
00176             #endif
00177             return;
00178       }
00179 
00180       //Validate the existance of the soldier.
00181       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pSchedule->ubSoldierID ];
00182       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
00183       {
00184             // dead or dying!
00185             return;
00186       }
00187 
00188       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
00189       {
00190             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00191                   ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Schedule callback:  Soldier isn't active.  Name is %s.", pSoldier->name );
00192             #endif
00193       }
00194 
00195       //Okay, now we have good pointers to the soldier and the schedule.
00196       //Now, determine which time in this schedule that we are processing.
00197       fAutoProcess = FALSE;
00198       if( guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
00199       {
00200             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00201                   //ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Schedule callback occurred outside of tactical -- Auto processing!" );
00202             #endif
00203             fAutoProcess = TRUE;
00204       }
00205       else
00206       {
00207             for( iScheduleIndex = 0; iScheduleIndex < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; iScheduleIndex++ )
00208             {
00209                   if( pSchedule->usTime[ iScheduleIndex ] == GetWorldMinutesInDay() )
00210                   {
00211                         #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00212                               //ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Processing schedule on time -- AI processing!" );
00213                         #endif
00214                         break;
00215                   }
00216             }
00217             if( iScheduleIndex == MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS )
00218             {
00219                   fAutoProcess = TRUE;
00220                   #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00221                         //ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Possible timewarp causing schedule callback to occur late -- Auto processing!" );
00222                   #endif
00223             }
00224       }
00225       if ( fAutoProcess )
00226       {
00227             UINT32 uiStartTime, uiEndTime;
00228             //Grab the last time the eventlist was queued.  This will tell us how much time has passed since that moment,
00229             //and how long we need to auto process this schedule.
00230             uiStartTime = (guiTimeOfLastEventQuery / 60) % NUM_MIN_IN_DAY;
00231             uiEndTime = GetWorldMinutesInDay();
00232             if( uiStartTime != uiEndTime )
00233             {
00234                   PrepareScheduleForAutoProcessing( pSchedule, uiStartTime, uiEndTime );
00235             }
00236       }
00237       else
00238       {
00239             // turn off all active-schedule flags before setting 
00240             // the one that should be active!
00241             pSchedule->usFlags &= ~SCHEDULE_FLAGS_ACTIVE_ALL;
00242 
00243             switch( iScheduleIndex )
00244             {
00245                   case 0:                 pSchedule->usFlags |= SCHEDULE_FLAGS_ACTIVE1;               break;
00246                   case 1:                 pSchedule->usFlags |= SCHEDULE_FLAGS_ACTIVE2;               break;
00247                   case 2:                 pSchedule->usFlags |= SCHEDULE_FLAGS_ACTIVE3;               break;
00248                   case 3:                 pSchedule->usFlags |= SCHEDULE_FLAGS_ACTIVE4;               break;
00249             }
00250             pSoldier->fAIFlags |= AI_CHECK_SCHEDULE;
00251             pSoldier->bAIScheduleProgress = 0;
00252       }
00253 
00254 }
00255 
00256 //Called before leaving the editor, or saving the map.  This recalculates
00257 //all of the schedule IDs from scratch and adjusts the effected structures accordingly.
00258 void OptimizeSchedules()
00259 {
00260       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule;
00261       SOLDIERINITNODE *pNode;
00262       UINT8 ubOldScheduleID;
00263       gubScheduleID = 0;
00264       pSchedule = gpScheduleList;
00265       while( pSchedule )
00266       {
00267             gubScheduleID++;
00268             ubOldScheduleID = pSchedule->ubScheduleID;
00269             if( ubOldScheduleID != gubScheduleID )
00270             { //The schedule ID has changed, so change all links accordingly.
00271                   pSchedule->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00272                   pNode = gSoldierInitHead;
00273                   while( pNode )
00274                   {
00275                         if( pNode->pDetailedPlacement && pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID == ubOldScheduleID )
00276                         {
00277                               //Temporarily add 100 to the ID number to ensure that it doesn't get used again later.
00278                               //We will remove it immediately after this loop is complete.
00279                               pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID + 100;
00280                               if( pNode->pSoldier )
00281                               {
00282                                     pNode->pSoldier->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00283                               }
00284                               break;
00285                         }
00286                         pNode = pNode->next;
00287                   }
00288             }
00289             pSchedule = pSchedule->next;
00290       }
00291       //Remove the +100 IDs.
00292       pNode = gSoldierInitHead;
00293       while( pNode )
00294       {
00295             if( pNode->pDetailedPlacement && pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID > 100 )
00296             {
00297                   pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID -= 100;
00298             }
00299             pNode = pNode->next;
00300       }
00301 }

00303 //Called when transferring from the game to the editor.  
00304 void PrepareSchedulesForEditorEntry()
00305 {
00306       SCHEDULENODE *curr, *prev, *temp;
00307       
00308       //Delete all schedule events.  The editor will automatically warp all civilians to their starting locations.
00309       DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE );
00310 
00311       //Now, delete all of the temporary schedules.
00312       curr = gpScheduleList;
00313       prev = NULL;
00314       while( curr )
00315       {
00316             if( curr->usFlags & SCHEDULE_FLAGS_TEMPORARY )
00317             {
00318                   if( prev )
00319                         prev->next = curr->next;
00320                   else
00321                         gpScheduleList = gpScheduleList->next;
00322                   MercPtrs[ curr->ubSoldierID ]->ubScheduleID = 0;
00323                   temp = curr;
00324                   curr = curr->next;
00325                   MemFree( temp );
00326                   gubScheduleID--;
00327             }
00328             else 
00329             {
00330                   if( curr->usFlags & SCHEDULE_FLAGS_SLEEP_CONVERTED )
00331                   { //uncovert it!
00332                         INT32 i;
00333                         for( i = 0 ; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00334                         {
00335                               //if( i 
00336                         }
00337                   }
00338                   prev = curr;
00339                   curr = curr->next;
00340             }
00341       }
00342 }

00344 //Called when leaving the editor to enter the game.  This posts all of the events that apply.
00345 void PrepareSchedulesForEditorExit()
00346 {
00347       PostSchedules();
00348 }
00349 
00350 void LoadSchedules( INT8 **hBuffer )
00351 {
00352       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule = NULL;
00353       SCHEDULENODE temp;
00354       UINT8 ubNum;
00355 
00356       // delete all the schedules we might have loaded (though we shouldn't have any loaded!!)
00357       if ( gpScheduleList )
00358       {
00359             DestroyAllSchedules();
00360       }
00361 
00362       LOADDATA( &ubNum, *hBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
00363       gubScheduleID = 1;
00364       while( ubNum )
00365       {
00366             LOADDATA( &temp, *hBuffer, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00367 
00368             if( gpScheduleList )
00369             {
00370                   pSchedule->next = (SCHEDULENODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00371                   Assert( pSchedule->next );
00372                   pSchedule = pSchedule->next;
00373                   memcpy( pSchedule, &temp, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00374             }
00375             else
00376             {
00377                   gpScheduleList = (SCHEDULENODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00378                   Assert( gpScheduleList );
00379                   memcpy( gpScheduleList, &temp, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00380                   pSchedule = gpScheduleList;
00381             }
00382             pSchedule->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00383             pSchedule->ubSoldierID = NO_SOLDIER;
00384             pSchedule->next = NULL;
00385             gubScheduleID++;
00386             ubNum--;
00387       }
00388       //Schedules are posted when the soldier is added...
00389 }
00390 
00391 extern BOOLEAN gfSchedulesHosed;
00392 BOOLEAN LoadSchedulesFromSave( HWFILE hFile )
00393 {
00394       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule = NULL;
00395       SCHEDULENODE temp;
00396       UINT8 ubNum;
00397       UINT32 ubRealNum;
00398 
00399       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead, uiNumBytesToRead;
00400 
00401       //LOADDATA( &ubNum, *hBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
00402       uiNumBytesToRead = sizeof( UINT8 );
00403       FileRead( hFile, &ubNum, uiNumBytesToRead, &uiNumBytesRead );
00404       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiNumBytesToRead )
00405       {
00406             FileClose( hFile );
00407             return( FALSE);
00408       }
00409 
00410       //Hack problem with schedules getting misaligned.
00411       ubRealNum = gfSchedulesHosed ? ubNum + 256 : ubNum;
00412 
00413       gubScheduleID = 1;
00414       while( ubRealNum )
00415       {
00416             uiNumBytesToRead = sizeof( SCHEDULENODE );
00417             FileRead( hFile, &temp, uiNumBytesToRead, &uiNumBytesRead );
00418             if( uiNumBytesRead != uiNumBytesToRead )
00419             {
00420                   FileClose( hFile );
00421                   return( FALSE);
00422             }
00423             //LOADDATA( &temp, *hBuffer, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00424 
00425             if( gpScheduleList )
00426             {
00427                   pSchedule->next = (SCHEDULENODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00428                   Assert( pSchedule->next );
00429                   pSchedule = pSchedule->next;
00430                   memcpy( pSchedule, &temp, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00431             }
00432             else
00433             {
00434                   gpScheduleList = (SCHEDULENODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00435                   Assert( gpScheduleList );
00436                   memcpy( gpScheduleList, &temp, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00437                   pSchedule = gpScheduleList;
00438             }
00439 
00440             // should be unnecessary here, then we can toast reconnect schedule
00441             /*
00442             pSchedule->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00443             pSchedule->ubSoldierID = NO_SOLDIER;
00444             */
00445 
00446             pSchedule->next = NULL;
00447             gubScheduleID++;
00448             ubRealNum--;
00449       }
00450       //Schedules are posted when the soldier is added...
00451       return( TRUE );
00452 }

00454 
00455 //used to fix a bug in the editor where the schedules were reversed.  Because only
00456 //some maps were effected, this feature was required.
00457 void ReverseSchedules()
00458 {
00459       SCHEDULENODE *pReverseHead, *pPrevReverseHead, *pPrevScheduleHead;
00460       UINT8 ubOppositeID = gubScheduleID;
00461       //First, remove any gaps which would mess up the reverse ID assignment by optimizing
00462       //the schedules.
00463       OptimizeSchedules();
00464       pReverseHead = NULL;
00465       while( gpScheduleList )
00466       {
00467             //reverse the ID
00468             gpScheduleList->ubScheduleID = ubOppositeID;
00469             ubOppositeID--;
00470             //detach current schedule head from list and advance it
00471             pPrevScheduleHead = gpScheduleList;
00472             gpScheduleList = gpScheduleList->next;
00473             //get previous reversed list head (even if null)
00474             pPrevReverseHead = pReverseHead;
00475             //Assign the previous schedule head to the reverse head
00476             pReverseHead = pPrevScheduleHead;
00477             //Point the next to the previous reverse head.
00478             pReverseHead->next = pPrevReverseHead;
00479       }
00480       //Now assign the schedule list to the reverse head.
00481       gpScheduleList = pReverseHead;
00482 }
00483 
00484 //Another debug feature.
00485 void ClearAllSchedules()
00486 {
00487       SOLDIERINITNODE *pNode;
00488       DestroyAllSchedules();
00489       pNode = gSoldierInitHead;
00490       while( pNode )
00491       {
00492             if( pNode->pDetailedPlacement && pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID )
00493             {
00494                   pNode->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID = 0;
00495                   if( pNode->pSoldier )
00496                   {
00497                         pNode->pSoldier->ubScheduleID = 0;
00498                   }
00499             }
00500             pNode = pNode->next;
00501       }
00502 }
00503 
00504 BOOLEAN SaveSchedules( HWFILE hFile )
00505 {
00506       SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00507       UINT32 uiBytesWritten;
00508       UINT8 ubNum, ubNumFucker;
00509       INT32 iNum;
00510       //Now, count the number of schedules in the list
00511       iNum = 0;
00512       curr = gpScheduleList;
00513       while( curr )
00514       {
00515             // skip all default schedules
00516             if ( !(curr->usFlags & SCHEDULE_FLAGS_TEMPORARY) )
00517             {
00518                   iNum++;
00519             }
00520             curr = curr->next;
00521       }
00522       ubNum = (UINT8)(( iNum >= 32 ) ? 32 : iNum);
00523 
00524       FileWrite( hFile, &ubNum, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
00525       if ( uiBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00526       {
00527             return( FALSE );
00528       }
00529       //Now, save each schedule
00530       curr = gpScheduleList;
00531       ubNumFucker = 0;
00532       while( curr )
00533       {
00534             // skip all default schedules
00535             if ( !(curr->usFlags & SCHEDULE_FLAGS_TEMPORARY) )
00536             {
00537 
00538                   ubNumFucker++;
00539                   if( ubNumFucker > ubNum )
00540                   {
00541                         return( TRUE );
00542                   }
00543                   FileWrite( hFile, curr, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ), &uiBytesWritten );
00544                   if ( uiBytesWritten != sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) )
00545                   {
00546                         return( FALSE );
00547                   }
00548 
00549             }
00550             curr = curr->next;
00551       }
00552       return( TRUE );
00553 }
00554 
00555 //Each schedule has upto four parts to it, so sort them chronologically.
00556 //Happily, the fields with no times actually are the highest.
00557 BOOLEAN SortSchedule( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule )
00558 { 
00559       INT32 index, i, iBestIndex;
00560       UINT16 usTime;
00561       UINT16 usData1;
00562       UINT16 usData2;
00563       UINT8 ubAction;
00564       BOOLEAN fSorted = FALSE;
00565 
00566       //Use a bubblesort method (max:  3 switches).
00567       index = 0;
00568       while( index < 3 )
00569       {
00570             usTime = 0xffff;
00571             iBestIndex = index;
00572             for( i = index; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00573             {
00574                   if( pSchedule->usTime[ i ] < usTime )
00575                   {
00576                         usTime = pSchedule->usTime[ i ];
00577                         iBestIndex = i;
00578                   }
00579             }
00580             if( iBestIndex != index )
00581             { //we will swap the best index with the current index.
00582                   fSorted = TRUE;
00583                   usTime            = pSchedule->usTime[ index ];
00584                   usData1           = pSchedule->usData1[ index ];
00585                   usData2           = pSchedule->usData2[ index ];
00586                   ubAction    = pSchedule->ubAction[ index ];
00587                   pSchedule->usTime[ index ]          = pSchedule->usTime[ iBestIndex ];
00588                   pSchedule->usData1[ index ]         = pSchedule->usData1[ iBestIndex ];
00589                   pSchedule->usData2[ index ]         = pSchedule->usData2[ iBestIndex ];
00590                   pSchedule->ubAction[ index ]  = pSchedule->ubAction[ iBestIndex ];
00591                   pSchedule->usTime[ iBestIndex ]           = usTime;
00592                   pSchedule->usData1[ iBestIndex ]    = usData1;
00593                   pSchedule->usData2[ iBestIndex ]    = usData2;
00594                   pSchedule->ubAction[ iBestIndex ]   = ubAction;
00595             }
00596             index++;
00597       }
00598       return fSorted;
00599 }
00600 
00601 BOOLEAN BumpAnyExistingMerc( INT16 sGridNo ) 
00602 {
00603       UINT8                               ubID;
00604       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier; // NB this is the person already in the location,
00605       INT16                               sNewGridNo;
00606       UINT8                               ubDir;
00607       INT16                               sCellX, sCellY;
00608 
00609       // this is for autoprocessing schedules...
00610       // there could be someone in the destination location, in which case
00611       // we want to 'bump' them to the nearest available spot
00612 
00613       if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
00614       {
00615             return( TRUE );
00616       }
00617 
00618       ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 0 );
00619 
00620       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
00621       {
00622             return( TRUE );
00623       }
00624 
00625       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
00626 
00627       // what if the existing merc is prone?
00628       sNewGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( pSoldier, STANDING, 5, &ubDir, 1, pSoldier );
00629       //sNewGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotExcludingSweetSpot( pSoldier, sGridNo, 10, &ubDir );
00630 
00631       if ( sNewGridNo == NOWHERE )
00632       {
00633             return( FALSE );
00634       }
00635 
00636       ConvertGridNoToCellXY( sNewGridNo, &sCellX, &sCellY );
00637       EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00638 
00639       return( TRUE );
00640 }
00641 
00642 void AutoProcessSchedule( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule, INT32 index )
00643 {
00644       INT16                               sCellX, sCellY, sGridNo;
00645       INT8                                bDirection;
00646       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00647 
00648       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
00649       {
00650             // CJC, November 28th:  when reloading a saved game we want events posted but no events autoprocessed since
00651             // that could change civilian positions.  So rather than doing a bunch of checks outside of this function,
00652             // I thought it easier to screen them out here.
00653             return;
00654       }
00655             
00656       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pSchedule->ubSoldierID ];
00657 
00658       #ifdef JA2EDITOR
00659             if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00660             {
00661                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Autoprocessing schedule action %S for %S (%d) at time %02ld:%02ld (set for %02d:%02d), data1 = %d", 
00662                         gszScheduleActions[ pSchedule->ubAction[ index ] ],
00663                         pSoldier->name,
00664                         pSoldier->ubID,
00665                         GetWorldHour(),
00666                         guiMin,
00667                         pSchedule->usTime[ index ] / 60,
00668                         pSchedule->usTime[ index ] % 60,
00669                         pSchedule->usData1[ index ]) );
00670             }
00671             else
00672             {
00673                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Autoprocessing schedule action %S for civ (%d) at time %02ld:%02ld (set for %02d:%02d), data1 = %d", 
00674                         gszScheduleActions[ pSchedule->ubAction[ index ] ],               
00675                         pSoldier->ubID,
00676                         GetWorldHour(),
00677                         guiMin,
00678                         pSchedule->usTime[ index ] / 60,
00679                         pSchedule->usTime[ index ] % 60,
00680                         pSchedule->usData1[ index ]) );
00681             }
00682       #endif
00683 
00684       // always assume the merc is going to wake, unless the event is a sleep
00685       pSoldier->fAIFlags &= ~(AI_ASLEEP);
00686 
00687       switch( pSchedule->ubAction[ index ] )
00688       {
00689             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_LOCKDOOR:
00690             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_UNLOCKDOOR:
00691             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_OPENDOOR:
00692             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_CLOSEDOOR:
00693                   PerformActionOnDoorAdjacentToGridNo( pSchedule->ubAction[ index ], pSchedule->usData1[ index ] );
00694                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( pSchedule->usData2[ index ] );
00695                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( pSchedule->usData2[ index ], &sCellX, &sCellY );
00696 
00697                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00698                   if ( GridNoOnEdgeOfMap( pSchedule->usData2[ index ], &bDirection ) )
00699                   {
00700                         // civ should go off map; this tells us where the civ will return
00701                         pSoldier->sOffWorldGridNo = pSchedule->usData2[ index ];
00702                         MoveSoldierFromMercToAwaySlot( pSoldier );
00703                         pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
00704                   }
00705                   else
00706                   {
00707                         // let this person patrol from here from now on
00708                         pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0] = pSchedule->usData2[ index ];
00709                   }
00710                   break;
00711             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_GRIDNO:
00712                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( pSchedule->usData1[ index ] );
00713                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( pSchedule->usData1[ index ], &sCellX, &sCellY );
00714                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00715                   // let this person patrol from here from now on
00716                   pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0] = pSchedule->usData1[ index ];
00717                   break;
00718             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_ENTERSECTOR:
00719                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_DONT_ADD_TO_SECTOR )
00720                   {
00721                         // never process enter if flag is set
00722                         break;
00723                   }
00724                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( pSchedule->usData1[ index ] );
00725                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( pSchedule->usData1[ index ], &sCellX, &sCellY );
00726                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00727                   MoveSoldierFromAwayToMercSlot( pSoldier );
00728                   pSoldier->bInSector = TRUE;
00729                   // let this person patrol from here from now on
00730                   pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0] = pSchedule->usData1[ index ];
00731                   break;
00732             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_WAKE:
00733                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( pSoldier->sInitialGridNo );
00734                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( pSoldier->sInitialGridNo, &sCellX, &sCellY );
00735                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00736                   // let this person patrol from here from now on
00737                   pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0] = pSoldier->sInitialGridNo;
00738                   break;
00739             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_SLEEP:
00740                   pSoldier->fAIFlags |= AI_ASLEEP;
00741                   // check for someone else in the location
00742                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( pSchedule->usData1[ index ] );
00743                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( pSchedule->usData1[ index ], &sCellX, &sCellY );
00744                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00745                   pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0] = pSchedule->usData1[ index ];
00746                   break;
00747             case SCHEDULE_ACTION_LEAVESECTOR:
00748                   sGridNo = FindNearestEdgePoint( pSoldier->sGridNo );
00749                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( sGridNo );
00750                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( sGridNo, &sCellX, &sCellY );
00751                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00752 
00753                   sGridNo = FindNearbyPointOnEdgeOfMap( pSoldier, &bDirection );
00754                   BumpAnyExistingMerc( sGridNo );
00755                   ConvertGridNoToCellXY( sGridNo, &sCellX, &sCellY );
00756                   EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( pSoldier, (FLOAT)sCellX, (FLOAT)sCellY );
00757 
00758                   // ok, that tells us where the civ will return
00759                   pSoldier->sOffWorldGridNo = sGridNo;
00760                   MoveSoldierFromMercToAwaySlot( pSoldier );
00761                   pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
00762                   break;
00763       }
00764 }
00765 
00766 void PostSchedule( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00767 {
00768       UINT32 uiStartTime, uiEndTime;
00769       INT32 i;
00770       INT8  bEmpty;
00771       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule;
00772       UINT8 ubTempAction;
00773       UINT16      usTemp;
00774       
00775       if ( (pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP) && ( gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP ] || ( (gubQuest[ QUEST_KINGPIN_MONEY ] == QUESTINPROGRESS) && (CheckFact( FACT_KINGPIN_CAN_SEND_ASSASSINS, KINGPIN )) ) ) && (gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_C) && (pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE) )
00776       {
00777             // no schedules for people guarding Tony's!
00778             return;
00779       }
00780       
00781       pSchedule = GetSchedule( pSoldier->ubScheduleID );
00782       if( !pSchedule )
00783             return;
00784 
00785       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_PERMANENT_INSERTION_CODE )
00786       {
00787             // don't process schedule
00788             return;
00789       }
00790 
00791       //if this schedule doesn't have a time associated with it, then generate a time, but only
00792       //if it is a sleep schedule.
00793       for( i = 0; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00794       {
00795             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ i ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_SLEEP )
00796             {
00797                   // first make sure that this merc has a unique spot to sleep in
00798                   SecureSleepSpot( pSoldier, pSchedule->usData1[ i ] );
00799 
00800                   if( pSchedule->usTime[ i ] == 0xffff )
00801                   {
00802                         pSchedule->usTime[ i ] = (UINT16)( (21*60) + Random( (3*60) )); //9PM - 11:59PM
00803 
00804                         if ( ScheduleHasMorningNonSleepEntries( pSchedule ) )
00805                         {
00806                               // this guy will sleep until the next non-sleep event
00807                         }
00808                         else
00809                         {
00810                               bEmpty = GetEmptyScheduleEntry( pSchedule );
00811                               if ( bEmpty != -1 )
00812                               {
00813                                     // there is an empty entry for the wakeup call
00814 
00815                                     // NB the wakeup call must be ordered first! so we have to create the
00816                                     // wake action and then swap the two.
00817                                     pSchedule->ubAction[ bEmpty ] = SCHEDULE_ACTION_WAKE;
00818                                     pSchedule->usTime[ bEmpty ] = (pSchedule->usTime[ i ] + (8*60)) % NUM_MIN_IN_DAY; // sleep for 8 hours
00819 
00820                                     ubTempAction = pSchedule->ubAction[ bEmpty ];
00821                                     pSchedule->ubAction[ bEmpty ] = pSchedule->ubAction[ i ];
00822                                     pSchedule->ubAction[ i ] = ubTempAction;
00823 
00824                                     usTemp = pSchedule->usTime[ bEmpty ];
00825                                     pSchedule->usTime[ bEmpty ] = pSchedule->usTime[ i ];
00826                                     pSchedule->usTime[ i ] = usTemp;
00827                                     
00828                                     usTemp = pSchedule->usData1[ bEmpty ];
00829                                     pSchedule->usData1[ bEmpty ] = pSchedule->usData1[ i ];
00830                                     pSchedule->usData1[ i ] = usTemp;
00831 
00832                                     usTemp = pSchedule->usData2[ bEmpty ];
00833                                     pSchedule->usData2[ bEmpty ] = pSchedule->usData2[ i ];
00834                                     pSchedule->usData2[ i ] = usTemp;
00835                               }
00836                               else
00837                               {
00838                                     // no morning entries but no space for a wakeup either, will sleep till
00839                                     // next non-sleep event
00840                               }
00841                               
00842                         }
00843                         break; //The break is here because nobody should have more than one sleep schedule with no time specified.
00844                   }     
00845             }
00846       }
00847 
00848       pSchedule->ubSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
00849 
00850       // always process previous 24 hours
00851       uiEndTime = GetWorldTotalMin();
00852       uiStartTime = uiEndTime - (NUM_MIN_IN_DAY - 1);
00853       
00854       /*
00855       //First thing we need is to get the time that the map was last loaded.  If more than 24 hours,
00856       //then process only 24 hours.  If less, then process all the schedules that would have happened within 
00857       //that period of time.
00858       uiEndTime = GetWorldTotalMin();
00859       if( GetWorldTotalMin() - guiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded > NUM_MIN_IN_DAY )
00860       { //Process the last 24 hours
00861             uiStartTime = uiEndTime - (NUM_MIN_IN_DAY - 1);
00862       }
00863       else
00864       { //Process the time since we were last here.
00865             uiStartTime = guiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded;
00866       }
00867       */
00868       
00869       //Need a way to determine if the player has actually modified doors since this civilian was last loaded
00870       uiEndTime %= NUM_MIN_IN_DAY;
00871       uiStartTime %= NUM_MIN_IN_DAY;
00872       PrepareScheduleForAutoProcessing( pSchedule, uiStartTime, uiEndTime );
00873 }
00874 
00875 void PrepareScheduleForAutoProcessing( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule, UINT32 uiStartTime, UINT32 uiEndTime )
00876 {
00877       INT32 i;
00878       BOOLEAN     fPostedNextEvent = FALSE;
00879 
00880       if ( uiStartTime > uiEndTime )
00881       { //The start time is later in the day than the end time, which means we'll be wrapping 
00882             //through midnight and continuing to the end time.
00883             for( i = 0; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00884             {
00885                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] == 0xffff )
00886                         break;
00887                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] >= uiStartTime )
00888                   {
00889                         AutoProcessSchedule( pSchedule, i );
00890                   }
00891             }
00892             for( i = 0; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00893             {
00894                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] == 0xffff )
00895                         break;
00896                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] <= uiEndTime )
00897                   {
00898                         AutoProcessSchedule( pSchedule, i );
00899                   }
00900                   else
00901                   {
00902                         // CJC: Note that end time is always passed in here as the current time so GetWorldDayInMinutes will be for the correct day
00903                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE, GetWorldDayInMinutes() + pSchedule->usTime[i], pSchedule->ubScheduleID );
00904                         fPostedNextEvent = TRUE;
00905                         break;
00906                   }
00907             }
00908       }
00909       else
00910       { //Much simpler:  start at the start and continue to the end.
00911             for( i = 0; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00912             {
00913                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] == 0xffff )
00914                         break;
00915 
00916                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] >= uiStartTime && pSchedule->usTime[i] <= uiEndTime )
00917                   {
00918                         AutoProcessSchedule( pSchedule, i );
00919                   }
00920                   else if ( pSchedule->usTime[i] >= uiEndTime )
00921                   {
00922                         fPostedNextEvent = TRUE;
00923                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE, GetWorldDayInMinutes() + pSchedule->usTime[i], pSchedule->ubScheduleID );
00924                         break;
00925                   }
00926 
00927             }
00928       }
00929 
00930       if ( !fPostedNextEvent )
00931       {
00932             // reached end of schedule, post first event for soldier in the next day
00933             // 0th event will be first.
00934             // Feb 1:  ONLY IF THERE IS A VALID EVENT TO POST WITH A VALID TIME!
00935             if ( pSchedule->usTime[0] != 0xffff )
00936             {
00937                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE, GetWorldDayInMinutes() + NUM_MIN_IN_DAY + pSchedule->usTime[0], pSchedule->ubScheduleID );
00938             }
00939       }
00940 }
00941 
00942 //Leave at night, come back in the morning.  The time variances are a couple hours, so
00943 //the town doesn't turn into a ghost town in 5 minutes.
00944 void PostDefaultSchedule( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00945 {
00946       INT32 i;
00947       SCHEDULENODE *curr;
00948 
00949       if( gbWorldSectorZ )
00950       { //People in underground sectors don't get schedules.
00951             return;
00952       }
00953       //Create a new node at the head of the list.  The head will become the new schedule
00954       //we are about to add.
00955       curr = gpScheduleList;
00956       gpScheduleList = (SCHEDULENODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00957       memset( gpScheduleList, 0, sizeof( SCHEDULENODE ) );
00958       gpScheduleList->next = curr;
00959       gubScheduleID++;
00960       //Assign all of the links
00961       gpScheduleList->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00962       gpScheduleList->ubSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
00963       pSoldier->ubScheduleID = gubScheduleID;
00964 
00965       //Clear the data inside the schedule
00966       for( i = 0; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
00967       {
00968             gpScheduleList->usTime[i] = 0xffff;
00969             gpScheduleList->usData1[i] = 0xffff;
00970             gpScheduleList->usData2[i] = 0xffff;
00971       }
00972       //Have the default schedule enter between 7AM and 8AM
00973       gpScheduleList->ubAction[0] = SCHEDULE_ACTION_ENTERSECTOR;
00974       gpScheduleList->usTime[0] = (UINT16)(420 + Random( 61 ));
00975       gpScheduleList->usData1[0] = pSoldier->sInitialGridNo;
00976       //Have the default schedule leave between 6PM and 8PM
00977       gpScheduleList->ubAction[1] = SCHEDULE_ACTION_LEAVESECTOR;
00978       gpScheduleList->usTime[1] = (UINT16)(1080 + Random( 121 ));
00979       gpScheduleList->usFlags |= SCHEDULE_FLAGS_TEMPORARY;
00980       
00981       if( gubScheduleID == 255 )
00982       { //Too much fragmentation, clean it up...
00983             OptimizeSchedules();
00984             if( gubScheduleID == 255 )
00985             {
00986                   AssertMsg( 0, "TOO MANY SCHEDULES POSTED!!!" );
00987             }
00988       }
00989 
00990       PostSchedule( pSoldier );
00991 }
00992 
00993 
00994 void PostSchedules()
00995 {
00996       SOLDIERINITNODE *curr;
00997       BOOLEAN fDefaultSchedulesPossible = FALSE;
00998 
00999       #if defined( DISABLESCHEDULES ) //definition found at top of this .c file.
01000 
01001             return;
01002 
01003       #endif
01004       //If no way to leave the map, then don't post default schedules.
01005       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 || gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 ||
01006               gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 || gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
01007       {
01008             fDefaultSchedulesPossible = TRUE;
01009       }
01010       curr = gSoldierInitHead;
01011       while( curr )
01012       {
01013             if( curr->pSoldier && curr->pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
01014             {
01015                   if( curr->pDetailedPlacement && curr->pDetailedPlacement->ubScheduleID )
01016                   {
01017                         PostSchedule( curr->pSoldier );
01018                   }
01019                   else if( fDefaultSchedulesPossible )
01020                   {
01021                         // ATE: There should be a better way here...
01022                         if( curr->pSoldier->ubBodyType != COW && 
01023                                     curr->pSoldier->ubBodyType != BLOODCAT && 
01024                                     curr->pSoldier->ubBodyType != HUMVEE &&
01025                                 curr->pSoldier->ubBodyType != ELDORADO && 
01026                                 curr->pSoldier->ubBodyType != ICECREAMTRUCK && 
01027                                 curr->pSoldier->ubBodyType != JEEP )
01028                         {
01029                               PostDefaultSchedule( curr->pSoldier );
01030                         }
01031                   }
01032             }
01033             curr = curr->next;
01034       }
01035 }
01036 
01037 void PerformActionOnDoorAdjacentToGridNo( UINT8 ubScheduleAction, UINT16 usGridNo )
01038 {
01039       INT16             sDoorGridNo;
01040       DOOR *            pDoor;
01041 
01042       sDoorGridNo = FindDoorAtGridNoOrAdjacent( (INT16) usGridNo );
01043       if (sDoorGridNo != NOWHERE)
01044       {
01045             switch( ubScheduleAction )
01046             {
01047                   case SCHEDULE_ACTION_LOCKDOOR:
01048                         pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sDoorGridNo );
01049                         if (pDoor)
01050                         {
01051                               pDoor->fLocked = TRUE;
01052                         }
01053                         // make sure it's closed as well
01054                         ModifyDoorStatus( sDoorGridNo, FALSE, DONTSETDOORSTATUS );
01055                         break;
01056                   case SCHEDULE_ACTION_UNLOCKDOOR:
01057                         pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sDoorGridNo );
01058                         if (pDoor)
01059                         {
01060                               pDoor->fLocked = FALSE;
01061                         }
01062                         break;
01063                   case SCHEDULE_ACTION_OPENDOOR:
01064                         ModifyDoorStatus( sDoorGridNo, TRUE, DONTSETDOORSTATUS );
01065                         break;
01066                   case SCHEDULE_ACTION_CLOSEDOOR:
01067                         ModifyDoorStatus( sDoorGridNo, FALSE, DONTSETDOORSTATUS );
01068                         break;
01069             }
01070       }
01071 }
01072 
01073 //Assumes that a schedule has just been processed.  This takes the current time, and compares it to the
01074 //schedule, and looks for the next schedule action that would get processed and posts it.
01075 void PostNextSchedule( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01076 {
01077       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule;
01078       INT32 i, iBestIndex;
01079       UINT16 usTime, usBestTime;
01080       pSchedule = GetSchedule( pSoldier->ubScheduleID );
01081       if( !pSchedule )
01082       { //post default?
01083             return;
01084       }
01085       usTime = (UINT16)GetWorldMinutesInDay();
01086       usBestTime = 0xffff;
01087       iBestIndex = -1;
01088       for( i = 0; i < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; i++ )
01089       {
01090             if( pSchedule->usTime[i] == 0xffff )
01091                   continue;
01092             if( pSchedule->usTime[i] == usTime )
01093                   continue;
01094             if( pSchedule->usTime[i] > usTime )
01095             {
01096                   if( pSchedule->usTime[i] - usTime < usBestTime )
01097                   {
01098                         usBestTime = pSchedule->usTime[ i ] - usTime;
01099                         iBestIndex = i;
01100                   }
01101             }
01102             else if ( (NUM_MIN_IN_DAY - (usTime - pSchedule->usTime[ i ])) < usBestTime )
01103             {
01104                   usBestTime = NUM_MIN_IN_DAY - (usTime - pSchedule->usTime[ i ]);
01105                   iBestIndex = i;
01106             }
01107       }
01108       Assert( iBestIndex >= 0 );
01109 
01110       AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_PROCESS_TACTICAL_SCHEDULE, GetWorldDayInMinutes() + pSchedule->usTime[iBestIndex], pSchedule->ubScheduleID );
01111 }
01112 
01113 
01114 
01115 BOOLEAN ExtractScheduleEntryAndExitInfo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT32 * puiEntryTime, UINT32 * puiExitTime )
01116 {
01117       INT32             iLoop;
01118       BOOLEAN           fFoundEntryTime = FALSE, fFoundExitTime = FALSE;
01119       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule;
01120 
01121       *puiEntryTime = 0;
01122       *puiExitTime = 0;
01123 
01124       pSchedule = GetSchedule( pSoldier->ubScheduleID );
01125       if ( !pSchedule )
01126       {
01127             // If person had default schedule then would have been assigned and this would 
01128             // have succeeded.
01129             // Hence this is an error.
01130             return( FALSE );
01131       }
01132 
01133       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; iLoop++ )
01134       {
01135             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ iLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_ENTERSECTOR )
01136             {
01137                   fFoundEntryTime = TRUE;
01138                   *puiEntryTime = pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ];
01139             }
01140             else if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ iLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_LEAVESECTOR )             
01141             {
01142                   fFoundExitTime = TRUE;
01143                   *puiExitTime = pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ];
01144             }
01145       }
01146 
01147       if ( fFoundEntryTime && fFoundExitTime )
01148       {
01149             return( TRUE );
01150       }
01151       else
01152       {
01153             return( FALSE );
01154       }
01155 
01156 }
01157 
01158 
01159 // This is for determining shopkeeper's opening/closing hours
01160 BOOLEAN ExtractScheduleDoorLockAndUnlockInfo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT32 * puiOpeningTime, UINT32 * puiClosingTime )
01161 {
01162       INT32             iLoop;
01163       BOOLEAN           fFoundOpeningTime = FALSE, fFoundClosingTime = FALSE;
01164       SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule;
01165 
01166       *puiOpeningTime = 0;
01167       *puiClosingTime = 0;
01168 
01169       pSchedule = GetSchedule( pSoldier->ubScheduleID );
01170       if ( !pSchedule )
01171       {
01172             // If person had default schedule then would have been assigned and this would 
01173             // have succeeded.
01174             // Hence this is an error.
01175             return( FALSE );
01176       }
01177 
01178       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; iLoop++ )
01179       {
01180             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ iLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_UNLOCKDOOR )
01181             {
01182                   fFoundOpeningTime = TRUE;
01183                   *puiOpeningTime = pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ];
01184             }
01185             else if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ iLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_LOCKDOOR )
01186             {
01187                   fFoundClosingTime = TRUE;
01188                   *puiClosingTime = pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ];
01189             }
01190       }
01191 
01192       if ( fFoundOpeningTime && fFoundClosingTime )
01193       {
01194             return( TRUE );
01195       }
01196       else
01197       {
01198             return( FALSE );
01199       }
01200 
01201 }
01202 
01203 
01204 BOOLEAN GetEarliestMorningScheduleEvent( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule, UINT32 * puiTime )
01205 {
01206       INT32             iLoop;
01207       BOOLEAN           fFoundTime = FALSE;
01208 
01209       *puiTime = 100000;
01210 
01211       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; iLoop++ )
01212       {
01213             if ( pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ] < (12*60) && pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ] < *puiTime )
01214             {
01215                   *puiTime = pSchedule->usTime[ iLoop ];
01216             }
01217       }
01218 
01219       if ( *puiTime == 100000 )
01220       {
01221             return( FALSE );
01222       }
01223       else
01224       {
01225             return( TRUE );
01226       }
01227 }
01228 
01229 BOOLEAN ScheduleHasMorningNonSleepEntries( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule )
01230 {
01231       INT8              bLoop;
01232 
01233       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; bLoop++ )
01234       {
01235             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ bLoop ] != SCHEDULE_ACTION_NONE && pSchedule->ubAction[ bLoop ] != SCHEDULE_ACTION_SLEEP )
01236             {
01237                   if ( pSchedule->usTime[ bLoop ] < (12*60) )
01238                   {
01239                         return( TRUE );
01240                   }
01241             }
01242       }
01243       return( FALSE );
01244 }
01245 
01246 INT8 GetEmptyScheduleEntry( SCHEDULENODE *pSchedule )
01247 {
01248       INT8              bLoop;
01249 
01250       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; bLoop++ )
01251       {
01252             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ bLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_NONE )
01253             {
01254                   return( bLoop );
01255             }
01256       }
01257 
01258       return( -1 );
01259 }

01289 
01290 UINT16 FindSleepSpot( SCHEDULENODE * pSchedule )
01291 {
01292       INT8              bLoop;
01293 
01294       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; bLoop++ )
01295       {
01296             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ bLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_SLEEP )
01297             {
01298                   return( pSchedule->usData1[ bLoop ] );
01299             }
01300       }
01301       return( NOWHERE );
01302 }
01303 
01304 void ReplaceSleepSpot( SCHEDULENODE * pSchedule, UINT16 usNewSpot )
01305 {
01306       INT8              bLoop;
01307 
01308       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_SCHEDULE_ACTIONS; bLoop++ )
01309       {
01310             if ( pSchedule->ubAction[ bLoop ] == SCHEDULE_ACTION_SLEEP )
01311             {
01312                   pSchedule->usData1[ bLoop ] = usNewSpot;
01313                   break;
01314             }
01315       }
01316 
01317 }
01318 
01319 
01320 void SecureSleepSpot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT16 usSleepSpot )
01321 {
01322       SOLDIERTYPE *                 pSoldier2;
01323       UINT16                                    usSleepSpot2, usNewSleepSpot;
01324       UINT32                                    uiLoop;
01325       SCHEDULENODE *          pSchedule;
01326       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
01327 
01328       // start after this soldier's ID so we don't duplicate work done in previous passes
01329       for ( uiLoop = pSoldier->ubID + 1; uiLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; uiLoop++ )
01330       {
01331             pSoldier2 = MercPtrs[ uiLoop ];
01332             if ( pSoldier2->bActive && pSoldier2->bInSector && pSoldier2->ubScheduleID != 0 )
01333             {
01334                   pSchedule = GetSchedule( pSoldier2->ubScheduleID );
01335                   if ( pSchedule )
01336                   {
01337                         usSleepSpot2 = FindSleepSpot( pSchedule );
01338                         if ( usSleepSpot2 == usSleepSpot )
01339                         {
01340                               // conflict!
01341                               //usNewSleepSpot = (INT16) FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( pSoldier2, pSoldier2->usAnimState, usSleepSpot2, 3, &ubDirection, FALSE );
01342                               usNewSleepSpot = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotExcludingSweetSpot( pSoldier2, usSleepSpot2, 3, &ubDirection );
01343                               if ( usNewSleepSpot != NOWHERE )
01344                               {
01345                                     ReplaceSleepSpot( pSchedule, usNewSleepSpot );
01346                               }
01347                         }
01348                   }
01349             }
01350       }
01351 
01352 }
